remarks: Lattice join is associative.  Lemma 2.2 in [MegPav2002] p. 362. ( ~ chjass analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 17-Sep-2011.)
statement:
latjass.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
latjass.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
latjass $p |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( ( X .\/ Y ) .\/ Z ) = ( X .\/ ( Y .\/ Z ) ) ) $.
